name: Titanopoles
description:
Thanks for playing.

I made this game with a help from my friend, Mo-Vinci, in the art.

Took all my time during the game jam so I hope it is good.

Notes:

1: The lie is not in the gameplay- the game is not a lier- nor in the content - I am not the lier- but the lie is in … well I can't tell you this will spoil it.

2: The game is totally passable, but you need to find the secrets ;).

3: The controls is in the credit page, down in the menu.

4: I will post a walkthrough the game and its development on my YouTube page(The Guntech Gaming)

5: Please tell me how many times you pressed the restart button during a full run down in the comments

6: If you can't "rest" do it while moving not steady.

7: … I aaaa forgot.
